code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./ProductList.css';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchProducts();},[]);const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/products');const data=await response.json();setProducts(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching products:',error);toast.error('Error accessing Product API',{position:"top-right",autoClose:3000});}};const formatImageName=name=>{return"/images/products/".concat(name,".webp");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"plist-product-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"plist-header-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{component:Link,to:"/",variant:"outlined",style:{marginRight:'auto'},children:"\u2190 Back to Homepage"})}),products.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No products found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-grid",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/products/".concat(product.id),className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:formatImageName(product.name),alt:product.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name})})]},product.id))})]});};export default ProductList;
